Hi Renee,

Which plan did you want to go for? The Free one or the paid one? If it's the paid one, please create an account, pay for the plan and then send me your logins. If it's the Free plan, I can do it from our end.

HI HEath,
Ok fantastic, we would like to trial it for 6 months, what is our next steps?

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Renee,

Ok sure, either the Free plan or Startup Plan. The biggest advantage of the Startup Plan is some extra SEO features for the languages. Theoretically, let's say if a parent is using Google in another language, such as Chinese, your site may outrank a competitors site (if they don't also offer translation). Additionally, the Startup Plan will give more accurate and contextual translations versus the free plan.

I hope this clarifies.

Hi Heath,

After our discussions, we've decided to move forward. Which plan do you believe would be the most beneficial for us at this stage?

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Hi Renee,

Yes sure, we can do this with Google Translate.

You would need a licence, which can be purchased here:
https://gtranslate.io/

There is a free version, but as you pay more, you get more features, such as better translation (more human like) and search engine indexing.

We can likely install and configure under your allocated care plan developer time.

Is this what you had in mind?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Unknown Workflow** workflow

I hope you're doing well.


I wanted to inquire about the possibility of adding a feature to our website that allows families to switch languages with a simple click of a button. I've seen this implemented on other sites and believe it would be a great benefit for our community. Is this something we can explore?


Thank you
